Articles.Content:
Hello everyone my name is Boyercam and I have been playing KSP for about 3 weeks know. I played the demo and loved it. Now I have donated 15 USDollars (around 9 BritishSterlingPounds) an am usually found playing KSP.

You might have seen me around the forms already as I went straight into the 'Deep End'

Thank you for reading and I hope to enjoy my KSP Experience.

Boyercam

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hello, and enjoy your stay, it will be a long and luxurious time with you here.

Enjoy throwing Kerbals into space FOR SCIENCE.

-Arcane

Possibly Drugged Man
